title: adidas Unisex-Adult Adissage Slides Sandal
description: These easy-to-wear slides offer post-workout relaxation and rejuvenation. Soft and quick drying, they feature an adjustable bandage-style upper and a plush Cloudfoam midsole. Massage nubs in the footbed soothe and recharge hard-working feet.
bullets: Hook-and-loop closure for an adjustable fit
Single-bandage EVA upper for lightweight comfort; EVA massage nubs on footbed
Cloudfoam midsole and memory foam sockliner for step-in comfort and superior cushioning
Unisex product is men's sizing. Women should size down 1 to 1.5 sizes
